meaningMnemonic: Sitting safely under your <radical>canopy</radical> you take <radical>rice</radical> and <radical>dirt</radical>, mix it up, and create unique <kanji>cosmetics</kanji> for your face.
readingMnemonic: You need these <kanji>cosmetics</kanji> because you have a meeting with the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) coming up. You want to impress him, and you don't want anyone to copy your look.
